parts.text: I'm thrilled about what’s happening.
That's wonderful! Here's some uplifting, art to reinforce that excitement!
Life, wow!
It's such a thing to be alive!
Life is good!
It's great when things work out! Here's some uplifting, art to reinforce that excitement!
The weather is beautiful.
I hope you've had time to enjoy it! Here's some beautiful art to go with your beautiful day!
Class was great!
Nothing like a solid class! Here's some positive vibes to keep up the momentum!

Aw, that's so wodnerful. Here's some happy family vibes for you''

The world sucks.
It's ok to feel that way. Sometimes the world is really horrible and we need to be hoenst about it. Here is some art that will help you feel some solidarity.

Every day won't be the best; but we can certainly seek out beauty whereever we are. May I invite you to look at this art?
